statements: OK, so you have to go to the bathroom.  Are you sure it can't wait?
How about I just take that as a yes?
...OK, OK, it can't wait.  I get it.
The best place to find a bathroom is probably Punxsutawney Station's welcome area.
It gets low marks for navigability, but there are a lot of shitters.  Find one and then exit the way you came.
